description: The Sunshine Village Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Sunshine Village for the snow report
Alexa, ask Sunshine Village for latest conditions
imageAltText: Snow Report for Sunshine Village icon
name: Snow Report for Sunshine Village
shortDescription: The Sunshine Village Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Sunshine Village.
